text:
Sati then sat in padmasan and closed her yes.
 By her yogic powers she united with Shiva and her lifeless body fell into the yagya-kunda.
 This incident shocked everybody and the rudraganas furiously picked up their weapons.
 Right then a heavenly voice was heard.
 "O mean Daksha! Share on you! you are a sinner and a fool.
 Now you are certain to face the wrath of Shiva.
 Because of your act, the deities too will have to suffer.
" Daksha became scarred.
 He immediately eulogising lord Vishnu.
title: Sati Gives Up Her Life
